== Nedumpana (CT) (628443) ==

Nedumpana (CT) is a town in the [[Kollam]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 13.74 sq. km. and harbouring 7094 households with total population of 29454 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 13 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 70 km. Male population is 14106 and female population is 15348. Scheduled Caste population is 2780 and Scheduled Tribes population is 37. Census Location Code of the town is 628443<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 13 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 70 km. Railway station is at Kollam at a distance of 13 km.
